candidates.why: Same group (issue). Produces Solution schema, supports auto-mode, and performs CLI-based issue creation + solution binding.
Issue planning workflow; overlaps in solution lifecycle and binding semantics.
Converts free-form input into structured issue artifacts; similar interaction model (confirm/persist) and Gemini usage patterns.
Reads lite-plan plan.json and follows task/acceptance structure; useful for plan.json shape and validations.
Validates plan/task artifacts and provides a verification checklist; useful for conversion sanity checks.

selected.why: Closest match: turns an upstream artifact into issue + bound solution with auto/interactive modes and CLI integration.
